title: Hydraulic Pump Performance Test
description: Comprehensive test to test hydraulic pump output under load
objective: Test hydraulic pump output under load
preconditions: Hydraulic fluid level within normal range
All required test equipment calibrated and available
Safety protocols reviewed and in place
test_steps: 9. Power down and secure test setup
expected_results: System shall test hydraulic pump output under load
No error messages or warnings displayed
actual_results: System partially test hydraulic pump output under load
notes: Test failed due to response time exceeding specification. Defect report DR-2025-0123 filed.
